$WmMPID_ニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Normal,Face|I hear a familiar voice calling out from
the Dragon's Gate. Could it be...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_07,0|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Play, play, play! C'mon—let's play!$k$pLet's play...riddles!$k$pI'll start! When you close your eyes,
you'll sometimes see me, but open
them, and I'll disappear!$k$pTell me, what am I?$k$pPlay, play, play! C'mon—let's play!$k$pOne answer is a dream, but that's
not very hard to guess! So what's
the tricky answer, then?$k$pLet's play! Let's...play.$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
